Name: oid
column6: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: collname
column6: collation name (unique per namespace and encoding)

Name: collnamespace
column6: the oid of the namespace that contains this collation

Name: collprovider
column6: provider of the collation: d = database default, c = libc, i = icu

Name: collencoding
column6: encoding in which the collation is applicable, or -1 if it works for any encoding

Name: collversion
column6: provider-specific version of the collation. this is recorded when the collation is created and then checked when it is used, to detect changes in the collation definition that could lead to data corruption.
